title: The Water Lily Fairy at the Ice Cream Palace
description: The Water Lily Fairy went to visit Cinisi, a small town in Sicily, known as the “Ice Cream Palace.” A special day was celebrated in this town for the children called “Ice Cream Day.” The rich men of this town were greedy and were trying to stop having Ice Cream Day. The fairy made a special day for the children. She caused these men to be jealous and saved Ice Cream Day for the children. Part of the proceeds from the sale of this book will be donated to society of St. Vincent de Paul.
author: Mary Ann Vitale
